MtkSurfaceBRFRegression.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00017 #include "MisrToolkit.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <stdio.h>      /* for printf */
00020 #include <getopt.h>     /* for getopt_long */
00021 #include <strings.h>        /* for strncasecmp */
00022 #include <HdfEosDef.h>      /* Definition of GDopen */
00023 
00024 #define MAX_FILENAME 5000
00025 #define MAX_FIELDNAME 1000
00026 #define MAX_LENGTH 1000
00027 #define GP_GMP_GRID_NAME "GeometricParameters"
00028 #define LAND_BRF_GRID_NAME "SubregParamsLnd"
00029 #define AGP_GRID_NAME "Standard"
00030 #define AGP_LAND_WATER_ID_FIELD_NAME "SurfaceFeatureID"
00031 #define AGP_LW_LAND 1 
00032 #define GLITTER_THRESHOLD_DEFAULT 40.0
00033 #define MAX_NUMBER_GP_GMP_FIELD 5
00034 #define LAND_BRF_FIELD_NAME "LandBRF"
00035 #define NUMBER_BAND 4
00036 #define NUMBER_CAMERA 9
00037 #define OUTPUT_GRIDNAME "SurfaceBRFRegression"
00038 
00039 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 /* Structure to contain command-line arguments.                             */
00041 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00042 
00043 typedef struct {
00044   char *proj_map_file;  /* Projection/map info file */
00045   char *land_file;      /* AS_LAND file */
00046   char *terrain_file;   /* GRP_TERRAIN file*/
00047   char *output_basename;   /* Output basename*/
00048   char agp_file[MAX_FILENAME];  /* AGP file (optional) */
00049   char geom_file[MAX_FILENAME]; /* GP_GMP file (optional) */
00050   float glitter_threshold;  /* Threshold for determining 
00051                    glitter contamination. */
00052   int  band;            /* Band to process. -1 = all */
00053   int output; /* 4 to output HDF4/HDF-EOS2, 5 for HDF5/HDF-EOS5 */
00054 } argr_type;       /* Argument parse result */
00055 
00056 #define ARGR_TYPE_INIT {NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0}, {0}, GLITTER_THRESHOLD_DEFAULT, -1, 4}
00057 
00058 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 /* Local function prototypes                                                */
00060 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 
00062 int process_args(int argc, char *argv[], argr_type *argr);
00063 
00064 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00065 /*  Main program.                                                           */
00066 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067 
00068 int main( int argc, char *argv[] ) {
00069   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00070   MTKt_status status_code = MTK_FAILURE;  /* Return code of this function */
00071   argr_type argr = ARGR_TYPE_INIT;  /* Command-line arguments */
00072   char *band_name[NUMBER_BAND] = {"Blue","Green","Red","NIR"};
00073   char *camera_name[NUMBER_CAMERA] = {"Df","Cf","Bf","Af","An",
00074                       "Aa","Ba","Ca","Da"};
00075   MTKt_GenericMapInfo target_map_info = MTKT_GENERICMAPINFO_INIT;
00076                 /* Target map information. */
00077   MTKt_GCTPProjInfo target_proj_info = MTKT_GCTPPROJINFO_INIT;
00078                 /* Target projection information.  */
00079   MTKt_Region region = MTKT_REGION_INIT; /* SOM region containing target map. */
00080   MTKt_DataBuffer land_brf_data = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00081                 /* LandBRF data */
00082   MTKt_DataBuffer land_brf_mask = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00083                 /* Valid mask for LandBRF data */
00084   MTKt_DataBuffer land_brf_mask_upsampled = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00085                 /* Valid mask for LandBRF data, upsampled to
00086                    full resolution of terrain data. */
00087   MTKt_DataBuffer land_brf_sigma = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00088                 /* Land BRF sigma */
00089   MTKt_MapInfo    land_brf_map_info = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00090                 /* Map information for LandBRF data  */
00091   MTKt_DataBuffer toa_brf_data = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00092                 /* Top-of-atmosphere BRF data */
00093   MTKt_MapInfo    toa_rad_rdqi_map_info = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00094                 /* Map information for terrain RDQI.  */
00095   MTKt_DataBuffer toa_rad_rdqi = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00096                 /* Top-of-atmosphere radiance data quality indicator */ 
00097   MTKt_DataBuffer toa_brf_mask = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00098                 /* Valid mask for TOA BRF. */
00099   MTKt_DataBuffer toa_brf_data_1100 = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00100                 /* Top-of-atmosphere BRF data at 1100 meters per pixel. */
00101   MTKt_DataBuffer toa_brf_mask_1100 = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00102                 /* Valid mask for 1100 meter TOA BRF. */
00103   MTKt_MapInfo    toa_brf_map_info = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00104                 /* Map information for terrain-projected radiance.  */
00105   MTKt_RegressionCoeff 
00106                   regression_coeff = MTKT_REGRESSION_COEFF_INIT;
00107                 /* Regression coefficients. */
00108   MTKt_DataBuffer smooth_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00109                 /* Temporary buffer to hold smoothed data. */
00110   MTKt_MapInfo    regression_coeff_map_info = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00111                 /* Map info for regression coefficients. */
00112   MTKt_DataBuffer regressed_data = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00113                 /* Regression result. */
00114   MTKt_DataBuffer regressed_mask = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00115                 /* Valid mask for regression result. */
00116   MTKt_DataBuffer latitude = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00117                 /* Temporary latitude array for reprojection. */
00118   MTKt_DataBuffer longitude = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00119                 /* Temporary longitude array for reprojection. */
00120   MTKt_DataBuffer line_coords = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00121                 /* Temporary line coord array for reprojection. */
00122   MTKt_DataBuffer sample_coords = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00123                 /* Temporary sample coord array for reprojection. */
00124   MTKt_DataBuffer resampled_regressed_brf_data = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00125                 /* Final result, resampled to target map. */
00126   MTKt_DataBuffer resampled_regressed_brf_mask = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00127                 /* Valid mask for final result. */
00128   MTKt_DataBuffer resampled_land_brf_data = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00129                 /* Input LandBRF, resampled to target map. */
00130   MTKt_DataBuffer resampled_land_brf_mask = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00131                 /* Valid mask for final result. */
00132   MTKt_DataBuffer resampled_toa_brf_data = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00133                 /* Input TOA BRF, resampled to target map. */
00134   MTKt_DataBuffer resampled_toa_brf_mask = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00135                 /* Valid mask for final result. */
00136   MTKt_DataBuffer glitter_data = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00137                 /* Glitter angle field. */
00138   MTKt_DataBuffer agp_land_water_id_data = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00139                 /* AGP land/water identifier. */
00140   MTKt_MapInfo    agp_land_water_id_map_info = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00141                 /* Map information for AGP land/water id field. */
00142   MTKt_DataBuffer glitter_mask = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00143                 /* Mask indicating glitter contaminated locations. */
00144   MTKt_MapInfo    glitter_map_info = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00145                 /* Map information for glitter angle field. */
00146   MTKt_DataBuffer resampled_glitter_data = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00147                 /* Glitter mask, resampled to target map. */
00148   int glitter_filter = 0;   /* Flag indicating if glitter filtering should
00149                    be done. */
00150   int path;             /* Orbit path number. */
00151   int camera;           /* Camera index. */
00152   int iband;            /* Loop iterator. */
00153   int iline;            /* Loop iterator. */
00154   int isample;          /* Loop iterator. */
00155   char outputfile[MAX_FILENAME];
00156   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS file identifier. */
00157   int32 gid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS grid identifier. */
00158   int32 hstatus;        /* HDF-EOS status code */
00159   float64 upleft[2];            /* min X, max Y corner of target map. */
00160   float64 lowright[2];          /* max X, min Y corner of target map. */
00161   char *dimlist_ul_lr = "YDim,XDim";
00162                 /* HDF-EOS dimension list for origin UL or 
00163                    origin LR maps.*/
00164   char *dimlist_ur_ll = "XDim,YDim";
00165                 /* HDF-EOS dimension list for origin UR or 
00166                    origin LL maps.*/
00167   char *dimlist;        /* HDF-EOS dimension list. */
00168   int32 edge[2];        /* Size of HDF-EOS data to write. */
00169   char fieldname[MAX_FIELDNAME]; /* Fieldname to read/write. */
00170   char gridname[MAX_FIELDNAME];  /* Gridname to read. */
00171   int size_x;            /* Size of map along X axis. */
00172   int size_y;            /* Size of map along Y axis. */
00173   int32 tile_rank = 2;       /* HDF tile rank */
00174   int32 tile_dims[2] = {64,64};  /* Tile dimensions. */
00175   int32 comp_code = HDFE_COMP_DEFLATE; /* GZIP compression code. */
00176   int32 comp_parm[1] = {5};        /* GZIP compression level. */
00177   float32 fill_float32 = -9999.0;      /* Fill value for float32 fields. */
00178   float32 fill_uint8 = 0;   /* Fill value for uint8 fields. */
00179 
00180   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00181   /* Parse command-line arguments.                                      */
00182   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00183 
00184   if (process_args(argc, argv, &argr))
00185     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00186 
00187   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00188   /* Read projection / map information for target area.                 */
00189   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00190 
00191   status = MtkGCTPProjInfoRead(argr.proj_map_file, &target_proj_info);
00192   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00193     printf("\n\nCheck that projection/map info filename is correct: %s\n",argr.proj_map_file);
00194     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkGCTPProjInfoRead\n");
00195   }
00196 
00197   status = MtkGenericMapInfoRead(argr.proj_map_file, &target_map_info);
00198   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00199     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkGenericMapInfoRead\n");
00200   }
00201 
00202   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00203   /* Get orbit path number of input file.                               */
00204   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00205 
00206   status = MtkFileToPath(argr.land_file, &path);
00207   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00208       printf("\n\nCheck that AS_LAND filename is correct: %s\n",argr.land_file);
00209       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkFileToPath(land)\n");
00210   }
00211 
00212   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00213   /* Get camera identifier from terrain input file.                     */
00214   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00215 
00216   {
00217     MTKt_DataBuffer attrbuf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00218 
00219     status = MtkFileAttrGet(argr.terrain_file,"Camera",&attrbuf);
00220     if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00221       printf("\n\nCheck that GRP_TERRAIN filename is correct: %s\n",argr.terrain_file);
00222       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkFileAttrGet(terrain_file)\n");
00223     }
00224     
00225     camera = attrbuf.data.i32[0][0] - 1;
00226   }
00227 
00228   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00229   /* Setup SOM region containing the target map.                        */
00230   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00231 
00232   status = MtkSetRegionByGenericMapInfo(&target_map_info,
00233                     &target_proj_info,
00234                     path,
00235                     &region);
00236   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00237     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkSetRegionByGenericMapInfo\n");
00238   }
00239 
00240   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00241   /* Create HDF-EOS file for result.                                    */
00242   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00243 
00244   if (target_map_info.origin_code == MTKe_ORIGIN_UL ||
00245       target_map_info.origin_code == MTKe_ORIGIN_LR) {
00246     dimlist = dimlist_ul_lr;
00247   } else {
00248     dimlist = dimlist_ur_ll;
00249   }
00250   
00251   edge[0] = target_map_info.size_line;
00252   edge[1] = target_map_info.size_sample;
00253 
00254   upleft[0] = target_map_info.min_x;
00255   upleft[1] = target_map_info.max_y;
00256   lowright[0] = target_map_info.max_x;
00257   lowright[1] = target_map_info.min_y;
00258 
00259   size_x = (int)floor((target_map_info.max_x - target_map_info.min_x) / 
00260               target_map_info.resolution_x + 0.5);
00261   size_y = (int)floor((target_map_info.max_y - target_map_info.min_y) / 
00262               target_map_info.resolution_y + 0.5);
00263     
00264   snprintf(outputfile,MAX_FILENAME,"%s_%s.hdf",argr.output_basename,
00265        camera_name[camera]);
00266   
00267   if (argr.output == 4) {
00268     fid = GDopen(outputfile,DFACC_CREATE);
00269     if (fid == FAIL) {
00270       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDopen\n");
00271     }
00272     
00273     hstatus = GDcreate(fid,OUTPUT_GRIDNAME,size_x, size_y, 
00274              upleft, lowright);
00275   
00276     gid = GDattach(fid, OUTPUT_GRIDNAME);
00277     if (gid == FAIL) {
00278       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDattach\n");
00279     }
00280   
00281     hstatus = GDdeforigin(gid,target_map_info.origin_code);
00282     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00283       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDdeforigin\n");
00284     }
00285   
00286     hstatus = GDdefpixreg(gid,target_map_info.pix_reg_code);
00287     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00288       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDdefpixreg\n");
00289     }
00290 
00291     hstatus = GDdefproj(gid,target_proj_info.proj_code,
00292               target_proj_info.zone_code, target_proj_info.sphere_code,
00293               target_proj_info.proj_param);
00294     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00295       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDdefproj\n");
00296     }
00297   } else { /* HDF5 output rather than 4 */
00298     /* 
00299     fid = HE5_GDopen(outputfile,DFACC_CREATE);
00300     if (fid == FAIL) {
00301       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with HE5_GDopen\n");
00302     }
00303     
00304     hstatus = HE5_GDcreate(fid,OUTPUT_GRIDNAME,size_x, size_y, 
00305              upleft, lowright);
00306   
00307     gid = HE5_GDattach(fid, OUTPUT_GRIDNAME);
00308     if (gid == FAIL) {
00309       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with HE5_GDattach\n");
00310     }
00311   
00312     hstatus = HE5_GDdeforigin(gid,target_map_info.origin_code);
00313     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00314       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with HE5_GDdeforigin\n");
00315     }
00316   
00317     hstatus = HE5_GDdefpixreg(gid,target_map_info.pix_reg_code);
00318     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00319       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with HE5_GDdefpixreg\n");
00320     }
00321 
00322     hstatus = HE5_GDdefproj(gid,target_proj_info.proj_code,
00323               target_proj_info.zone_code, target_proj_info.sphere_code,
00324               target_proj_info.proj_param);
00325     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00326       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with HE5_GDdefproj\n");
00327     }  */
00328   }
00329   
00330 
00331   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00332   /* Calculate pixel lat/lon locations for target map.                  */
00333   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00334 
00335   status = MtkGCTPCreateLatLon(&target_map_info,
00336                    &target_proj_info,
00337                    &latitude,
00338                    &longitude);
00339   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00340     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkGCTPCreateLatLon\n");
00341   }
00342 
00343   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00344   /* If AGP and geometric parameters are provided...                    */
00345   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00346 
00347   if (argr.agp_file[0] && argr.geom_file[0]) {
00348     glitter_filter = 1;
00349 
00350     printf("Calculating glitter mask...\n");
00351 
00352   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00353   /* Read glitter angle for the target area.                            */
00354   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00355 
00356     snprintf(fieldname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"%sGlitter",camera_name[camera]);
00357     status = MtkReadData(argr.geom_file, GP_GMP_GRID_NAME, fieldname,
00358              region, &glitter_data, &glitter_map_info);
00359     if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00360       printf("\n\nCheck that GP_GMP filename is correct: %s\n",argr.geom_file);
00361       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkReadData(geom)\n");
00362     }
00363 
00364   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00365   /* Read AGP land/water identifier for the target area.                */
00366   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00367 
00368     status = MtkReadData(argr.agp_file, AGP_GRID_NAME, 
00369              AGP_LAND_WATER_ID_FIELD_NAME,
00370              region, &agp_land_water_id_data, 
00371              &agp_land_water_id_map_info);
00372     if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00373       printf("\n\nCheck that AGP filename is correct: %s\n",argr.agp_file);
00374       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkReadData(agp)\n");
00375     }
00376 
00377   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00378   /* Generate glitter mask at 1.1 km.                                   */
00379   /* Glitter mask is set to 1 where location is glitter contaminated.   */
00380   /* Otherwise set to 0.                                                */
00381   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00382 
00383     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(agp_land_water_id_data.nline, 
00384                    agp_land_water_id_data.nsample,
00385                    MTKe_uint8, &glitter_mask);
00386     if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00387       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkDataBufferAllocate(glitter_mask)\n");
00388     }
00389     
00390     for (iline = 0; iline < agp_land_water_id_data.nline; iline++) {
00391       for (isample = 0; isample < agp_land_water_id_data.nsample; isample++) {
00392     if (agp_land_water_id_data.data.u8[iline][isample] != AGP_LW_LAND &&
00393         glitter_data.data.d[iline/16][isample/16] > 0 &&
00394         glitter_data.data.d[iline/16][isample/16] < argr.glitter_threshold) {
00395       glitter_mask.data.u8[iline][isample] = 1;
00396     } else {
00397       glitter_mask.data.u8[iline][isample] = 0;
00398     }
00399       }
00400     }
00401 
00402   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00403   /* Free memory.                                                       */
00404   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00405 
00406     MtkDataBufferFree(&agp_land_water_id_data);
00407     MtkDataBufferFree(&glitter_data);
00408 
00409   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00410   /* Reproject data to the target map.                                  */ 
00411   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00412 
00413     status = MtkTransformCoordinates(agp_land_water_id_map_info,
00414                      latitude, 
00415                      longitude,
00416                      &line_coords,
00417                      &sample_coords);
00418     if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00419       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkTransformCoordinates\n");
00420     }
00421 
00422     status = MtkResampleNearestNeighbor(glitter_mask, 
00423                     line_coords, 
00424                     sample_coords, 
00425                     &resampled_glitter_data);
00426     if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00427       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkResampleCubicConvolution\n");
00428     }
00429 
00430   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00431   /* Write reprojected glitter mask to HDF-EOS file.                    */
00432   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00433       
00434     snprintf(fieldname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"Glitter_Mask_%s",camera_name[camera]);
00435     hstatus = GDdeffield(gid, fieldname, dimlist, DFNT_UINT8, 0);
00436     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00437       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDdeffield(glitter)\n");
00438     }
00439     
00440     hstatus = GDsetfillvalue(gid, fieldname, &fill_uint8);
00441     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00442       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsetfillvalue()\n");
00443     }
00444     
00445     hstatus = GDsettilecomp(gid, fieldname, tile_rank, 
00446                 tile_dims, comp_code, comp_parm);
00447     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00448       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsettilecomp()\n");
00449     }
00450 
00451     hstatus = GDwritefield(gid, fieldname, NULL, NULL, edge, 
00452                resampled_glitter_data.dataptr);
00453     if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00454       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDwritefield(glitter)\n");
00455     }
00456 
00457   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00458   /* Free memory.                                                       */
00459   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00460 
00461       MtkDataBufferFree(&line_coords);
00462       MtkDataBufferFree(&sample_coords);
00463       MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_glitter_data);
00464 
00465   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00466   /* End if AGP and geometric parameters are provided.                  */
00467   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00468 
00469   }
00470 
00471   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00472   /* For each band to process...                                        */
00473   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00474 
00475   for (iband = 0 ; iband < NUMBER_BAND ; iband++)  {
00476     if (argr.band < 0 || iband == argr.band) {
00477 
00478       printf("Processing band %d (%s)...\n",iband, band_name[iband]);
00479 
00480   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00481   /* Read LandBRF for the target area.                                  */
00482   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00483 
00484       snprintf(fieldname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"%s[%d][%d]",LAND_BRF_FIELD_NAME,iband,camera);
00485 
00486       status = MtkReadData(argr.land_file, LAND_BRF_GRID_NAME, fieldname,
00487                region, &land_brf_data, &land_brf_map_info);
00488       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00489     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkReadData(LandBRF)\n");
00490       }
00491 
00492   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00493   /* Generate mask indicating valid LandBRF.                            */
00494   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00495 
00496       status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(land_brf_data.nline, land_brf_data.nsample,
00497                      MTKe_uint8,&land_brf_mask);
00498       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00499     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkDataBufferAllocate(toa_brf_mask)\n");
00500       }
00501 
00502       for (iline = 0; iline < land_brf_data.nline; iline++) {
00503     for (isample = 0; isample < land_brf_data.nsample; isample++) {
00504       if (land_brf_data.data.f[iline][isample] > 65532.0 ||
00505           land_brf_data.data.f[iline][isample] == 0.0) {
00506         land_brf_mask.data.u8[iline][isample] = 0;
00507       } else {
00508         land_brf_mask.data.u8[iline][isample] = 1;
00509       }
00510     }
00511       }
00512 
00513   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00514   /* Read TOA BRF for the target area.                                  */
00515   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00516 
00517       snprintf(gridname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"%sBand",band_name[iband]);
00518       snprintf(fieldname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"%s BRF",band_name[iband]);
00519       
00520       status = MtkReadData(argr.terrain_file, gridname, fieldname,
00521                region, &toa_brf_data, &toa_brf_map_info);
00522       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00523     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkReadData(Terrain)\n");
00524       }
00525 
00526   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00527   /* Read terrain-projected radiance data quality indicators for the    */
00528   /* the target area.                                                   */
00529   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00530 
00531       snprintf(gridname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"%sBand",band_name[iband]);
00532       snprintf(fieldname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"%s RDQI",band_name[iband]);
00533       
00534       status = MtkReadData(argr.terrain_file, gridname, fieldname,
00535                region, &toa_rad_rdqi, &toa_rad_rdqi_map_info);
00536       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00537     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkReadData(Terrain)\n");
00538       }
00539 
00540   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00541   /* Generate mask indicating valid TOA BRF.                            */
00542   /* TOA BRF is considered valid where the terrain-projected radiance   */
00543   /* data quality is less than 2.                                       */
00544   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00545 
00546       status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(toa_brf_data.nline, toa_brf_data.nsample,
00547                      MTKe_uint8,&toa_brf_mask);
00548       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00549     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkDataBufferAllocate(toa_brf_mask)\n");
00550       }
00551 
00552       for (iline = 0; iline < toa_brf_data.nline; iline++) {
00553     for (isample = 0; isample < toa_brf_data.nsample; isample++) {
00554       if (toa_rad_rdqi.data.u8[iline][isample] < 2) {
00555         toa_brf_mask.data.u8[iline][isample] = 1;
00556       } else {
00557         toa_brf_mask.data.u8[iline][isample] = 0;
00558       }
00559     }
00560       }
00561 
00562   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00563   /* Free memory.                                                       */
00564   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00565       
00566       MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_rad_rdqi);
00567 
00568   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00569   /* Generate Land BRF sigma.                                           */
00570   /* Set all to 1.0.  This gives equal weight to all LandBRF values.    */
00571   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00572 
00573       status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(land_brf_data.nline, land_brf_data.nsample,
00574                      MTKe_float,&land_brf_sigma);
00575       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00576     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkDataBufferAllocate(land_brf_sigma)\n");
00577       }
00578 
00579       for (iline = 0; iline < land_brf_data.nline; iline++) {
00580     for (isample = 0; isample < land_brf_data.nsample; isample++) {
00581       land_brf_sigma.data.f[iline][isample] = 1.0;
00582     }
00583       }
00584 
00585   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00586   /* Downsample terrain data to resolution of LandBRF.                  */
00587   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00588 
00589       status = MtkDownsample(&toa_brf_data,
00590                  &toa_brf_mask,
00591                  (land_brf_map_info.resolution / 
00592                   toa_brf_map_info.resolution),
00593                  &toa_brf_data_1100,
00594                  &toa_brf_mask_1100);
00595       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00596     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkDownsample\n");
00597       }
00598 
00599   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00600   /* If glitter information is available, filter out locations which    */
00601   /* are glitter contaminated.                                          */
00602   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00603 
00604       if (glitter_filter) {
00605     for (iline = 0; iline < toa_brf_data_1100.nline; iline++) {
00606       for (isample = 0; isample < toa_brf_data_1100.nsample; isample++) {
00607         if (glitter_mask.data.u8[iline][isample]) {
00608           toa_brf_mask_1100.data.u8[iline][isample] = 0;
00609         } else {
00610           toa_brf_mask_1100.data.u8[iline][isample] = 1;
00611         }
00612       }
00613     }
00614       }
00615 
00616   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00617   /* Generate regression coefficients, for mapping TOA BRF to LandBRF.  */
00618   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00619 
00620       status = MtkRegressionCoeffCalc(&toa_brf_data_1100, 
00621                       &toa_brf_mask_1100, 
00622                       &land_brf_data, 
00623                       &land_brf_sigma,
00624                       &land_brf_mask,
00625                       &land_brf_map_info,
00626                       16, 
00627                       &regression_coeff,
00628                       &regression_coeff_map_info);
00629       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00630     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkRegressionCoeffCalc()\n");
00631       }
00632 
00633   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00634   /* Free memory.                                                       */
00635   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00636 
00637       MtkDataBufferFree(&land_brf_sigma);
00638       MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_brf_data_1100);
00639       MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_brf_mask_1100);
00640 
00641   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00642   /* Smooth regression coefficients.                                    */
00643   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00644 
00645       status = MtkSmoothData(&regression_coeff.slope, 
00646                  &regression_coeff.valid_mask,
00647                  3, 3,
00648                  &smooth_tmp);
00649       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00650     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkSmoothData(slope)\n");
00651       }
00652 
00653       for (iline = 0; iline < regression_coeff.valid_mask.nline; iline++) {
00654     for (isample = 0; isample < regression_coeff.valid_mask.nsample; isample++) {
00655       if (regression_coeff.valid_mask.data.u8[iline][isample]) {
00656         regression_coeff.slope.data.f[iline][isample] = 
00657           smooth_tmp.data.f[iline][isample];
00658       }
00659     }
00660       }
00661 
00662       MtkDataBufferFree(&smooth_tmp);
00663 
00664       status = MtkSmoothData(&regression_coeff.intercept, 
00665                  &regression_coeff.valid_mask,
00666                  3, 3,
00667                  &smooth_tmp);
00668       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00669     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkSmoothData(intercept)\n");
00670       }
00671 
00672       for (iline = 0; iline < regression_coeff.valid_mask.nline; iline++) {
00673     for (isample = 0; isample < regression_coeff.valid_mask.nsample; isample++) {
00674       if (regression_coeff.valid_mask.data.u8[iline][isample]) {
00675         regression_coeff.intercept.data.f[iline][isample] = 
00676           smooth_tmp.data.f[iline][isample];
00677       }
00678     }
00679       }
00680 
00681       MtkDataBufferFree(&smooth_tmp);
00682 
00683   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00684   /* Apply regression to full resolution TOA BRF.                       */
00685   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00686 
00687       status = MtkApplyRegression(&toa_brf_data,
00688                   &toa_brf_mask, 
00689                   &toa_brf_map_info, 
00690                   &regression_coeff,
00691                   &regression_coeff_map_info,
00692                   &regressed_data,
00693                   &regressed_mask);
00694       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00695     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkApplyRegression\n");
00696       }
00697 
00698   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00699   /* Free memory.                                                       */
00700   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00701 
00702       MtkRegressionCoeffFree(&regression_coeff);
00703 
00704   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00705   /* Mask out locations where LandBRF is not available.                 */
00706   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00707 
00708       status = MtkUpsampleMask(&land_brf_mask,
00709                    (land_brf_map_info.resolution / 
00710                 toa_brf_map_info.resolution),
00711                    &land_brf_mask_upsampled);
00712       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00713     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkUpsampleMask\n");
00714       }
00715 
00716       for (iline = 0; iline < regressed_mask.nline; iline++) {
00717     for (isample = 0; isample < regressed_mask.nsample; isample++) {
00718       if (land_brf_mask_upsampled.data.u8[iline][isample] == 0) {
00719         regressed_mask.data.u8[iline][isample] = 0;
00720       }
00721     }
00722       }
00723 
00724       MtkDataBufferFree(&land_brf_mask_upsampled);
00725 
00726   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00727   /* Reproject LandBRF to the target map.                               */ 
00728   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00729 
00730       status = MtkTransformCoordinates(land_brf_map_info, 
00731                        latitude, 
00732                        longitude,
00733                        &line_coords,
00734                        &sample_coords);
00735       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00736     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkTransformCoordinates\n");
00737       }
00738 
00739       status = MtkResampleCubicConvolution(&land_brf_data, 
00740                        &land_brf_mask, 
00741                        &line_coords, 
00742                        &sample_coords, 
00743                        -0.5,
00744                        &resampled_land_brf_data,
00745                        &resampled_land_brf_mask);
00746       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00747     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkResampleCubicConvolution\n");
00748       }
00749 
00750   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00751   /* Free memory                                                        */
00752   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00753 
00754       MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_land_brf_mask);
00755       MtkDataBufferFree(&land_brf_data);
00756       MtkDataBufferFree(&land_brf_mask);
00757       MtkDataBufferFree(&line_coords);
00758       MtkDataBufferFree(&sample_coords);
00759 
00760   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00761   /* Reproject TOA BRF to target map.                                   */
00762   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00763 
00764       status = MtkTransformCoordinates(toa_brf_map_info, 
00765                        latitude, 
00766                        longitude,
00767                        &line_coords,
00768                        &sample_coords);
00769       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00770     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkTransformCoordinates\n");
00771       }
00772 
00773       status = MtkResampleCubicConvolution(&toa_brf_data, 
00774                        &toa_brf_mask, 
00775                        &line_coords, 
00776                        &sample_coords, 
00777                        -0.5,
00778                        &resampled_toa_brf_data,
00779                        &resampled_toa_brf_mask);
00780       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00781     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkResampleCubicConvolution\n");
00782       }
00783 
00784   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00785   /* Free memory                                                        */
00786   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00787       
00788       MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_toa_brf_mask);
00789       MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_brf_mask);
00790       MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_brf_data);
00791 
00792   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00793   /* Reproject regressed surface BRF values to target map.              */
00794   /* The regressed data is in the same grid as the TOA BRF, so it uses  */
00795   /* the same line/sample coordinates as above.                         */
00796   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00797 
00798       status = MtkResampleCubicConvolution(&regressed_data, 
00799                        &regressed_mask, 
00800                        &line_coords, 
00801                        &sample_coords, 
00802                        -0.5,
00803                        &resampled_regressed_brf_data,
00804                        &resampled_regressed_brf_mask);
00805       if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) {
00806     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with MtkResampleCubicConvolution\n");
00807       }
00808 
00809 
00810   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00811   /* Free memory                                                        */
00812   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00813 
00814       MtkDataBufferFree(&regressed_data);
00815       MtkDataBufferFree(&regressed_mask);
00816 
00817       MtkDataBufferFree(&line_coords);
00818       MtkDataBufferFree(&sample_coords);
00819 
00820   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00821   /* Write regressed BRF data to HDF-EOS file.                          */
00822   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00823       
00824       snprintf(fieldname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"Regressed_BRF_%s_%s",
00825            camera_name[camera], band_name[iband]);
00826 
00827       
00828       hstatus = GDdeffield(gid, fieldname, dimlist, DFNT_FLOAT32, 0);
00829       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00830     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDdeffield\n");
00831       }
00832 
00833       hstatus = GDsetfillvalue(gid, fieldname, &fill_float32);
00834       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00835     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsetfillvalue()\n");
00836       }
00837       
00838       hstatus = GDsettilecomp(gid, fieldname, tile_rank, 
00839                   tile_dims, comp_code, comp_parm);
00840       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00841     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsettilecomp()\n");
00842       }
00843 
00844       hstatus = GDwritefield(gid, fieldname, NULL, NULL, edge, 
00845                  resampled_regressed_brf_data.dataptr);
00846       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00847     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDwritefield\n");
00848       }
00849 
00850   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00851   /* Write regressed BRF mask to HDF-EOS file.                          */
00852   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00853 
00854       snprintf(fieldname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"Regressed_BRF_Mask_%s_%s",
00855            camera_name[camera], band_name[iband]);
00856 
00857     
00858       hstatus = GDdeffield(gid, fieldname, dimlist, DFNT_UINT8, 0);
00859       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00860     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDdeffield\n");
00861       }
00862 
00863       hstatus = GDsetfillvalue(gid, fieldname, &fill_uint8);
00864       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00865     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsetfillvalue()\n");
00866       }
00867       
00868       hstatus = GDsettilecomp(gid, fieldname, tile_rank, 
00869                   tile_dims, comp_code, comp_parm);
00870       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00871     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsettilecomp()\n");
00872       }
00873 
00874       hstatus = GDwritefield(gid, fieldname, NULL, NULL, edge, 
00875                  resampled_regressed_brf_mask.dataptr);
00876       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00877     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDwritefield\n");
00878       }
00879 
00880   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00881   /* Write input LandBRF to HDF-EOS file.                               */
00882   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00883 
00884       snprintf(fieldname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"LandBRF_%s_%s",
00885            camera_name[camera], band_name[iband]);
00886 
00887     
00888       hstatus = GDdeffield(gid, fieldname, dimlist, DFNT_FLOAT32, 0);
00889       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00890     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDdeffield\n");
00891       }
00892 
00893       hstatus = GDsetfillvalue(gid, fieldname, &fill_float32);
00894       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00895     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsetfillvalue()\n");
00896       }
00897     
00898       hstatus = GDsettilecomp(gid, fieldname, tile_rank, 
00899                   tile_dims, comp_code, comp_parm);
00900       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00901     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsettilecomp()\n");
00902       }
00903       
00904       hstatus = GDwritefield(gid, fieldname, NULL, NULL, edge,
00905                  resampled_land_brf_data.dataptr);
00906       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00907     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDwritefield\n");
00908       }
00909 
00910   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00911   /* Write input TOA BRF to HDF-EOS file.                               */
00912   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00913 
00914       snprintf(fieldname,MAX_FIELDNAME,"TOA_BRF_%s_%s",
00915            camera_name[camera], band_name[iband]);
00916 
00917       hstatus = GDdeffield(gid, fieldname, dimlist, DFNT_FLOAT32, 0);
00918       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00919     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDdeffield\n");
00920       }
00921 
00922       hstatus = GDsetfillvalue(gid, fieldname, &fill_float32);
00923       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00924     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsetfillvalue()\n");
00925       }
00926       
00927       hstatus = GDsettilecomp(gid, fieldname, tile_rank, 
00928                   tile_dims, comp_code, comp_parm);
00929       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00930     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDsettilecomp()\n");
00931       }
00932 
00933       hstatus = GDwritefield(gid, fieldname, NULL, NULL, edge, 
00934                  resampled_toa_brf_data.dataptr);
00935       if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00936     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDwritefield\n");
00937       }
00938 
00939   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00940   /* Free memory.                                                       */
00941   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00942 
00943       MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_regressed_brf_data);
00944       MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_regressed_brf_mask);
00945       MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_land_brf_data);
00946       MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_toa_brf_data);
00947 
00948   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00949   /* End loop for each band to process.                                 */
00950   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00951 
00952     }
00953   }
00954 
00955   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00956   /* Free memory.                                                       */
00957   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00958   
00959   if (glitter_filter) {
00960     MtkDataBufferFree(&glitter_mask);
00961   }
00962   MtkDataBufferFree(&latitude);
00963   MtkDataBufferFree(&longitude);
00964 
00965   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00966   /* Close HDF-EOS file.                                                */
00967   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00968 
00969   hstatus = GDdetach(gid);
00970   if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00971     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDdetach\n");
00972   }
00973   gid = FAIL;
00974   
00975   hstatus = GDclose(fid);
00976   if (hstatus == FAIL) {
00977     MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Trouble with GDclose\n");
00978   }
00979   fid = FAIL;
00980 
00981   printf("Wrote output to %s\n",outputfile);
00982   printf("Completed normally.\n");
00983   return 0;
00984 
00985 ERROR_HANDLE:
00986   if (gid != FAIL) {
00987     hstatus = GDdetach(gid);
00988   }
00989   if (fid != FAIL) {
00990     hstatus = GDclose(fid);
00991   }
00992   
00993   MtkDataBufferFree(&glitter_data);
00994   MtkDataBufferFree(&glitter_mask);
00995   MtkDataBufferFree(&agp_land_water_id_data);
00996   MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_glitter_data);
00997   MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_toa_brf_mask);
00998   MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_land_brf_mask);
00999   MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_toa_brf_data);
01000   MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_land_brf_data);
01001   MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_regressed_brf_data);
01002   MtkDataBufferFree(&resampled_regressed_brf_mask);
01003   MtkDataBufferFree(&latitude);
01004   MtkDataBufferFree(&longitude);
01005   MtkDataBufferFree(&regressed_data);
01006   MtkDataBufferFree(&regressed_mask);
01007   MtkDataBufferFree(&smooth_tmp);
01008   MtkRegressionCoeffFree(&regression_coeff);
01009   MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_brf_data_1100);
01010   MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_brf_mask_1100);
01011   MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_brf_mask);
01012   MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_rad_rdqi);
01013   MtkDataBufferFree(&toa_brf_data);
01014   MtkDataBufferFree(&land_brf_sigma);
01015   MtkDataBufferFree(&land_brf_mask_upsampled);
01016   MtkDataBufferFree(&land_brf_mask);
01017   MtkDataBufferFree(&land_brf_data);
01018   MtkDataBufferFree(&line_coords);
01019   MtkDataBufferFree(&sample_coords);
01020 
01021   printf("Failed: status code = %d\n",status_code);
01022   
01023   return status_code;
01024 }
01025 
01026 void usage(char *func) {
01027   fprintf(stderr,
01028 "\nUsage: %s [--help] [--band=<band number>] [--glitter-threshold=<value>]\n"
01029 "                     [--agp=<AGP filename> --geom=<GP_GMP filename>]\n"
01030 "                     <projection/map info file> <AS_LAND file> <GRP_TERRAIN file>\n"
01031 "                     <output basename>\n",
01032       func);
01033 
01034   fprintf(stderr,
01035 "\n"
01036 "Perform Top-of-atmosphere BRF to LandBRF regression and reproject the result to the\n"
01037 "given map projection.\n"
01038 "\n"
01039 "Result is written to an HDF-EOS file in the following fields:\n"
01040 "    Regressed_BRF_<cam>_<band>       Final result of the regression.\n"
01041 "    Regressed_BRF_Mask_<cam>_<band>  Mask indicating valid data.\n"
01042 "    TOA_BRF_<cam>_<band>             Input TOA BRF from GRP_TERRAIN file (reprojected).\n"
01043 "    LandBRF_<cam>_<band>             Input LandBRF from AS_LAND file (reprojected).\n"
01044 "    Glitter_Mask_<cam>               Mask indicating where sun glint is filtered.\n"
01045 "\n"
01046 "All output fields have identical map projection and size.\n"
01047 "\n"
01048       );
01049 
01050   fprintf(stderr,
01051 "COMMAND-LINE OPTIONS\n"
01052 "\n"
01053 "--help\n"
01054 "     Returns this usage info.\n"
01055 "\n"
01056 "--band=<band number>\n"
01057 "     Specifies the band to process.  Bands are identified by integer values as\n"
01058 "     follows: 0 = blue   1 = green   2 = red   3 = nir\n"
01059 "\n"
01060 "--agp=<AGP filename>\n"
01061 "     Optional parameter, specifying a MISR Ancillary Geographic Parameters\n"
01062 "     (AGP) file.  If provided, the AGP land/water identifier is used in\n"
01063 "     combination with the geometric parameters to filter possible sun glint\n"
01064 "     contamination from the top-of-atmosphere BRF.  Requires --geom.\n"
01065 "\n"
01066 "--geom=<GP_GMP filename>\n"
01067 "     Optional parameter, specifying a MISR Geometric Parameters file (GP_GMP).\n"
01068 "     This is required if --agp is set.\n"
01069 "\n"
01070 "--glitter-threshold=<value>\n"
01071 "     Glitter angle at which a water surface is considered to be glitter\n"
01072 "     contaminated in the top-of-atmosphere BRF.  Default is 40.0 degrees.\n"
01073 "     Glitter angle the angle between a vector from the observed point to\n"
01074 "     the camera and a vector pointing in the specular reflection direction.\n"
01075 "     Small glitter angles indicate the possibility of observing sun glint.\n"
01076 "\n"
01077 "--output=<type number>\n"
01078 "     Integer dentifier for output file HDF type. Use 4 for HDF4/HDF-EOS2 or use \n"
01079 "     5 for HDF5/HDF-EOS5. Defaults to 4.\n"
01080 "\n"    
01081       );
01082 
01083   fprintf(stderr,
01084 "COMMAND-LINE ARGUMENTS\n"
01085 "\n"
01086 "<projection/map info file>\n"
01087 "    Text file specifying map projection for the output.  Parameters are\n"
01088 "    specified as name = value pairs.   Parameter names are as follows:\n"
01089 "\n"
01090 "       proj_code is the GCTP projection code.\n"
01091 "       utm_zone is the UTM zone number for UTM projections only.\n"
01092 "       sphere_code is GCTP spheroid code.\n"
01093 "       proj_param(n) is the nth GCTP projection parameter.  (1 <= n <= 15)\n"
01094 "       min_corner_x is the minimum X coordinate at the edge of the map.\n"
01095 "       min_corner_y is the minimum Y coordinate at the edge of the map.\n"
01096 "       resolution_x is the size of a pixel along the X-axis.\n"
01097 "       resolution_y is the size of a pixel along the Y-axis.\n"
01098 "       number_pixel_x is the size of the map in pixels, along the X-axis.\n"
01099 "       number_pixel_y is the size of the map in pixels, along the Y-axis.\n"
01100 "       origin_code defines the corner of the map at which pixel 0,0 is located.\n"
01101 "       pix_reg_code defines whether a pixel value is related to the corner or\n"
01102 "         center of the corresponding area of that pixel on the map.  If the\n"
01103 "         corner is used, then it is always the corner corresponding to the\n"
01104 "         corner of the origin.\n"
01105 "\n"
01106 "       Possible values for origin_code are:\n"
01107 "         UL - Upper Left (min X, max Y);  Line=Y, Sample=X\n"
01108 "         UR - Upper Right (max X, max Y); Line=X, Sample=Y\n"
01109 "         LL - Lower Left (min X, min Y);  Line=X, Sample=Y\n"
01110 "         LR - Lower Right (max X, min Y); Line=Y, Sample=X\n"
01111 "\n"
01112 "       Possible values for pix_reg_code are:\n"
01113 "         CENTER - Center\n"
01114 "         CORNER - Corner\n"
01115 "\n"
01116 "       Unrecognized parameter names are ignored.\n"
01117 "       Lines starting with a '#' character are ignored.\n"
01118 "       Anything after the name = value pair on a line is ignored.\n"
01119 "\n"
01120 "       Example projection/map info file:\n"
01121 "       # Albers equal-area conic projection parameters\n"
01122 "       proj_code = 3    # Albers equal-area conic\n"
01123 "       sphere_code = 8  # GRS80\n"
01124 "       proj_param(3) = 29030000.0  # Latitude of the first standard parallel\n"
01125 "       proj_param(4) = 45030000.0  # Latitude of the second standard parallel\n"
01126 "       proj_param(5) = -96000000.0 # Longitude of the central meridian\n"
01127 "       proj_param(6) = 23000000.0  # Latitude of the projection origin\n"
01128 "       # Map information\n"
01129 "       min_corner_x = 1930612.449614\n"
01130 "       min_corner_y = 2493633.488881\n"
01131 "       resolution_x = 250.0\n"
01132 "       resolution_y = 250.0\n"
01133 "       number_pixel_x = 1311\n"
01134 "       number_pixel_y = 2078\n"
01135 "       origin_code = UL\n"
01136 "       pix_reg_code = CENTER\n"
01137 "\n"
01138 "\n"
01139 "<AS_LAND file>\n"
01140 "    MISR Land Surface parameters (AS_LAND).\n"
01141 "\n"
01142 "<GRP_TERRAIN>\n"
01143 "    MISR Terrain-projected Radiance Product (GRP_TERRAIN).\n"
01144 "\n"
01145 "<output basename>\n"
01146 "    Basename for output file.\n"
01147 "\n"
01148 "Examples:\n"
01149 "\n"
01150 "     MtkSurfaceBRFRegression --band=2 proj_map_info.txt \\\n"
01151 "         MISR_AM1_AS_LAND_P011_O013824_F06_0019.b52-56.hdf \\\n"
01152 "         MISR_AM1_GRP_TERRAIN_GM_P011_O013824_DF_F03_0024.b52-56.hdf \\\n"
01153 "         BRF_O013824_maine\n"
01154 "\n"
01155 "     MtkSurfaceBRFRegression \\\n"
01156 "         --geom=MISR_AM1_GP_GMP_P011_O013824_F03_0013.hdf \\\n"
01157 "         --agp=MISR_AM1_AGP_P011_F01_24.hdf \\\n"
01158 "         proj_map_info.txt \\\n"
01159 "         MISR_AM1_AS_LAND_P011_O013824_F06_0019.b52-56.hdf \\\n"
01160 "         MISR_AM1_GRP_TERRAIN_GM_P011_O013824_DF_F03_0024.b52-56.hdf \\\n"
01161 "         BRF_O013824_maine\n"
01162 "\n"
01163 "     MtkSurfaceBRFRegression --glitter-threshold=30.0\\\n"
01164 "         --geom=MISR_AM1_GP_GMP_P011_O013824_F03_0013.hdf \\\n"
01165 "         --agp=MISR_AM1_AGP_P011_F01_24.hdf \\\n"
01166 "         proj_map_info.txt \\\n"
01167 "         MISR_AM1_AS_LAND_P011_O013824_F06_0019.b52-56.hdf \\\n"
01168 "         MISR_AM1_GRP_TERRAIN_GM_P011_O013824_DF_F03_0024.b52-56.hdf \\\n"
01169 "         BRF_O013824_maine\n"
01170 "\n"
01171       );
01172 }
01173 
01174 int process_args(int argc, char *argv[], argr_type *argr) {
01175 
01176   MTKt_status status_code = MTK_FAILURE;
01177   extern char *optarg;
01178   extern int optind;
01179   int ch;
01180   argr->band = -1;
01181   
01182   /* options descriptor */
01183   static struct option longopts[] = {
01184     { "agp", required_argument,  0, 'a' },
01185     { "geom", required_argument, 0, 'g'},
01186     { "band", required_argument, 0, 'b' },
01187     { "help", no_argument,       0, 'h' },
01188     { "glitter-threshold", required_argument, 0, 't'},
01189     { "output", required_argument, 0, 'o'},    
01190     { 0,      0,                 0,  0 }
01191   };
01192 
01193   while ((ch = getopt_long(argc, argv, "a:g:b:t:hwo:", longopts, NULL)) != -1) {
01194 
01195     switch(ch) {
01196     case 'h':
01197       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_FAILURE);
01198       break;
01199     case 'a' : 
01200       strncpy(argr->agp_file,optarg,MAX_FILENAME);
01201       break;
01202     case 'g' : 
01203       strncpy(argr->geom_file,optarg,MAX_FILENAME);
01204       break;
01205     case 'b' : 
01206       argr->band = (int)atol(optarg);
01207       break;
01208     case 't' : 
01209       argr->glitter_threshold = atof(optarg);
01210       break;
01211     case 'o' : 
01212       argr->output = atoi(optarg);
01213       if (argr->output != 4 && argr->output != 5) {
01214         MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Invalid arguments");  
01215       }
01216       break;      
01217     default:
01218       MTK_ERR_MSG_JUMP("Invalid arguments");
01219     }
01220   }
01221 
01222   if (argc-optind != 4) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
01223 
01224   argr->proj_map_file = argv[optind++];
01225   argr->land_file = argv[optind++];
01226   argr->terrain_file = argv[optind++];
01227   argr->output_basename = argv[optind++];
01228 
01229   return MTK_SUCCESS;
01230  ERROR_HANDLE:
01231   usage(argv[0]);
01232   return status_code;
01233 }
